purpose: Showcase Titanverse consultation flow through POV carousel, demonstrating step-by-step process from starting consultation to structured summary, highlighting AI-powered features including template selection, voice transcription, auto-fill, AI chat, and automated follow-ups.
core_message: Less admin. More clarity. More care. Titanverse consultation flow from start to finish with AI support at every step.

Demonstrates complete consultation workflow with AI-powered features.
audience: Prospects interested in smart consultation workflows
